=wsg_50=

==1. Package Summary==

Driver for ROS to control the WSG-50 gripper, both in simulated and real version (using TCP or CAN protocol).
Part of this driver is based on the original standalone driver for TCP developed by Weiss.

 * Autor: Robotnik Automation
 * License: BSD
 * Source: svn https://wsg50-ros-pkg.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/
 
==2. Nodes ==

This package should work with WSG-50 grippers. In the CAN node, this driver assumes that you are using a PEAK USB-CAN converter, otherwise, it wouldn't work.
